metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

| where type == "microsoft.security/locations/alerts"
| project-rename P= properties

| extend IsIncident = Details.["IsIncident"]
| extend AlertDisplayName = Details.["AlertDisplayName"]
| extend SystemAlertId = Details.["SystemAlertId"]
| extend Severity = tostring(Details.["Severity"])
| where Severity == "High"
| extend AlertUri = Details.["AlertUri"]
| extend Status = tostring(Details.["Status"])
| extend Tactics = tostring(Details.["Intent"])
| extend ResourceIdentifiers = Details.["ResourceIdentifiers"]
| mv-expand ResourceIdentifiers
| extend ResourceId = parse_json(ResourceIdentifiers).["AzureResourceId"]
| where ("{ResourceIdFilter}"=="All" or ResourceId == "{ResourceIdFilter}") 
// if either alert name or new alert are set, union those 2 together, if neither are set treat as all
  and (("{AlertDisplayNameFilter}"=="All" and "{NewAlertFilter}" == "All") or AlertDisplayName == "{AlertDisplayNameFilter}" or AlertDisplayName == "{NewAlertFilter}")
 | extend SeverityRank = case(

    Severity == 'Medium', 2,
    Severity == 'Low', 1,
    0
    )
| parse AlertUri with * '/subscriptionId/'  SubscriptionId  '/' *
| parse AlertUri with * '/resourceGroup/'  ResourceGroup  '/' *
| parse AlertUri with * '/location/'  Location

- 19"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"securityresources
| where type == "microsoft.security/locations/alerts"
| project-rename P= properties
| extend Details = parse_json(P)
 | extend ResourceIdentifiers = Details.["ResourceIdentifiers"]
| extend IsIncident = Details.["IsIncident"]
| extend AlertDisplayName = Details.["AlertDisplayName"]
| extend SystemAlertId = Details.["SystemAlertId"]
| extend Severity = Details.["Severity"]
| extend AlertLink = Details.["AlertUri"]
| extend Status = Details.["Status"]
| extend Tactics = Details.["Intent"]
| parse AlertLink with * '/subscriptionId/'  SubscriptionId  '/' *
| parse AlertLink with * '/resourceGroup/'  ResourceGroup  '/' *
| parse AlertLink with * '/location/'  Location  
  | mv-expand ResourceIdentifiers
  | extend ResourceId = parse_json(ResourceIdentifiers).["AzureResourceId"]
  | where isnotempty(ResourceId )
| project  Severity, SystemAlertId, tostring(AlertDisplayName),IsIncident = iif(IsIncident=="true","Incident","Alert"),tostring(AlertLink),Status,Tactics,tostring(ResourceId),SubscriptionId,ResourceGroup,Location
| distinct tostring(SystemAlertId),tostring(AlertDisplayName),tostring(AlertLink),tostring(ResourceId)
| summarize count() by ResourceId, AlertLink, AlertDisplayName

| distinct AlertLink, AlertId, ResourceGroup,Location,SubscriptionId
| join kind = inner (SecurityAlert
| where isempty(ResourceId) == false
